rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0001
rows.name: Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Luxaar and these other synthesized lifeforms
were implanted with a failsafe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0003
rows.name: Insurance in case the Samaarians ever lost control of them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0004
rows.name: The key to that failsafe lives on in the human body...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0005
rows.name:
As Samaarians' descendants, our very DNA
is capable of stopping the Ganglion once and for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0006
rows.name: That's why they fear us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0006_02
rows.name:
Not our mims—but the Lifehold
that could bring us back, in the flesh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0007
rows.name: Lao...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0008
rows.name:
You did the right thing...
All is as it should be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0009
rows.name:
We've achieved our goal.
Humanity...has a future...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0010
rows.name: Soon, any threat from the Ganglion will be gone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Once we have our bodies...
Once we are...whole...again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0012
rows.name: How's it look?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0013
rows.name: Is it still running?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0014
rows.name: It's fine. Looks like it held together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0015
rows.name: Thank God. We saved it—all of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0016
rows.name: But...we couldn't save Lao...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0017
rows.name: On the contrary...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0018
rows.name:
By stopping him and preventing him from
destroying the system, we saved Lao, too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0019
rows.name: That's right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0020
rows.name:
His DNA...and his memories...
All of it is still stored in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Exactly. And with this...now we finally
have the means to bring him back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0022
rows.name: But wait...would he even want to come back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0023
rows.name:
All the things he did...
He'll be able to remember them all, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0024
rows.name:
All the more reason.
You can't make up for your mistakes when you're dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Hell, he'd better come back.
He's got work to do. Wrongs he needs to right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0026
rows.name: Heh... She's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0027
rows.name: Okay then... Come on, let's hurry up and restore the system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0029
rows.name: Colonel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0030
rows.name:
Everyone, wait.
There's one more thing I need to talk to you about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh man, what now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0032
rows.name: The truth is, exactly one mim in New LA...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0033
rows.name:
actually is being controlled remotely
from a real body held in stasis here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0034
rows.name: Wait, someone isn't stored in the database with the rest of us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0035
rows.name: That's right. This was a special case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0036
rows.name: The hell does that mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0037
rows.name: Better just to show you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0038
rows.name: Colonel![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0039
rows.name: E-Elma! Elma is dead?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0040
rows.name: No... I think this is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0041
rows.name:
I haven't died.
My consciousness has just returned to my real body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0042
rows.name: Elma...is that really you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0043
rows.name: Yes. This is my true form.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0044
rows.name: I was kept here in stasis...the only xenoform onboard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0045
rows.name: Wait a second... All this time, you were an alien?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0046
rows.name: No way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0047
rows.name: And all the more lovely for it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0048
rows.name:
I hope you all understand. And at the end of the day,
I just hope you'll still consider me as one of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0050
rows.name: Of course we will![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0051
rows.name:
You've earned that, Elma. It's not about how you look.
It's the person you are on the inside—that's what counts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0052
rows.name: Yes, yes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0062
rows.name: Lin's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0063
rows.name:
Colonel, listen—we know whatever you did,
you felt it was for the greater good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0064
rows.name: Yeah. Nothing's changed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0065
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0066
rows.name: Everyone—thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0067
rows.name:
Your trust means everything to me. And I have so much
more to tell you, now that this time has finally arrived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0068
rows.name: But first, there's something I must do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0069
rows.name: And it's something that...only I can do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0070
rows.name: There. The backup power should be all set.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0071
rows.name: Biometric authorization...accepted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0072
rows.name: Initializing backup power system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0073
rows.name:
Hey, so did that really just work?
There's no way it might still run out of juice?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0074
rows.name: No, it's working.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0075
rows.name: Elma—it's Secretary Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0076
rows.name: Put him through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0077
rows.name:
It's official, everyone: power has been restored.
Congratulations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0078
rows.name:
Vandham is reporting that the Ganglion forces
outside the Lifehold have been routed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0079
rows.name:
The Prospectors should have the main power system
back online in a matter of days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0080
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0081
rows.name: It's over. Excellent work—all of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0082
rows.name: Well, we all gotta die sometime...but it won't be today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0083
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0084
rows.name:
Once the main power's back online...
we don't need to worry about running out again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0085
rows.name:
And we won't even need that anymore
once we're back in our bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0086
rows.name: Yup. You got that right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0087
rows.name:
First things first—
we'll need to get the control system repaired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0088
rows.name:
Then we'll hit up the database down below.
We need to check on your memories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0089
rows.name: Just a second.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0090
rows.name:
Wasn't she saying she was gonna
tell us the rest of what she knows?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0091
rows.name: Hey, that's right. I got so excited I almost forgot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0092
rows.name:
Relax, there's no need for us to hurry, right? We're finally
home free—we've got all the time in the world now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0093
rows.name: Well, it's a pretty long story.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0094
rows.name: Tell you what—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0095
rows.name:
why don't we go back to New LA,
and we can talk over a nice, big celebratory feast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0096
rows.name: Good idea! Linly can cook it all! Tatsu will oversee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0097
rows.name:
Yeah, you can watch over everything...
from inside the stewpot. 'Kay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0098
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0099
rows.name: All right. It's settled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0100
rows.name: Well, then without further ado...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12150100_MSG0101
rows.name:
Right, back to New LA.
We're ready now... Ready to go home.[ST:wait ]
